title: The Utilization of Block-chain Innovation to Confirm KYC Records
tldr:
TLDR
This application allows users to manage their own identities through block-chain self-management and secure their data on the block-chain by replacing servers, ensuring the immutability and integrity of their information.
Expand

title: Securing Financial Systems with Block chain: A Comprehensive Review of Block chainand Cybersecurity Practices
tldr:
TLDR
As best practices are implemented and the threats advance, the financial institutions will be better placed to realize the full value of block chain technology while at the same time protecting the privacy and security of people’s financial transactions.
Expand

title: Role of Block-Chain in Health-Care Application
tldr:
TLDR
The suggested strategy can deal with a lot of medical services information while holding more noteworthy exchange speeds and further developed effectiveness, which recommends that it can possibly expand the versatility of blockchain-based wellbeing applications.
Expand

title: Exploring the Role of Block-chain Technology in Strengthening International Legal Guarantees for Investment Activity
venue: International journal of law and policy

title: Smart-City Ecosystem Using Block-Chain Technology
tldr:
TLDR
A Smart-city ecosystem model is suggested, which is founded on smart contracts established between firms, inhabitants, and government agencies, and it provides a synopsis of the potential application domains of the technology.
Expand

title: Design and Implementation of Block Chain with Cybersecurity Scheme for Fog Based Internet of Things
tldr:
TLDR
A protected Block chain-based conspire is given in this paper to guarantee the veracity of hubs and information and the security of information transmission in the mist climate.
Expand

title: A Decentralized Digital Voting System Based on Block chain Architecture
tldr:
TLDR
This Block chain enabled election is the need of the hour, People can cast votes from their own space just with the help of a mobile phone or a computer, Security would get enhanced and threats like EVM hacking, Chaos at election booth would reduce drastically just by the implementation of this advanced voting system.
Expand

title: The role of block chain technology in circular economy practices to improve organisational performance
venue: International Journal of Logistics Research and…
tldr:
TLDR
The role of blockchain technology for the circular economy to enhance organisational performance in the context of China–Pakistan-Economic-Corridor (CPEC) is examined.
Expand

title: Block Chain Application in Insurance Services: A Systematic Review of the Evidence
tldr:
TLDR
It is disclosed that blockchain, as a single source of reality, has the potential to improve productivity and mitigate the complexity of the insurance processes and the challenges and obstacles in the application of Blockchain technology in the Insurance Sector.
Expand
